name: Look at Bob
description:
This is a small project for an Game Jam (GDKO Round 2). The Task: *Tell a story using sound*
Story: You trying to get home but Bob stalks you. You know that Bob is shy so when you make eye contact with him he gets embarassed. Look Right/Left -> A/D - Left/Right Arrow The game is low effort because I've been busy lately so the game was only made in 2 days. Still an enjoyable experience I hope :|
